python  -m scripts.simplecnn.train ./data/cMedQA2/question.csv ./data/cMedQA2/answer.csv ./data/cMedQA2/small_candidates.txt ./data/cMedQA2/small_fake_eval.csv ./checkpoints/small

python  -m scripts.simplecnn.eval ./data/cMedQA2/question.csv ./data/cMedQA2/answer.csv ./data/cMedQA2/small_fake_eval.csv ./checkpoints/small
